Class HomeScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • smarttrolleygui.ControllerGeneral
      • smarttrolleygui.HomeScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class HomeScreenController
extends ControllerGeneral
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    HomeScreenController Class Description: HomeScreenController allows java interaction with HomeScreen.fxml
    Version:
    [1.0] [Date Created: 22/02/14], [1.1] [Date Created: 30/05/2014], [2.0] [Date Created: 08/06/2014], [2.1] [Date Created: 10/06/2014]
